name: OCKCompletionRingView
desc: A fillable ring with an inner checkmark.

items.name: var lineWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: The line width of the ring and check views.

items.name: var strokeColor: UIColor
items.desc: The color used to draw the ring and check views.

items.name: var progress: CGFloat
items.desc: The progress value of the ring view.

items.name: func setProgress(CGFloat, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the progress value for the ring view.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The length of time it takes for the ring and check view animations to complete.
